com.google.android.exoplayer.hls

Interface HlsTrackSelector

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultHlsTrackSelector

    public interface HlsTrackSelector
    Specifies a track selection from an HlsMasterPlaylist.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  HlsTrackSelector.Output
      Defines a selector output.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void selectTracks(HlsMasterPlaylist playlist, HlsTrackSelector.Output output)
      Outputs a track selection for a given period.

    • Method Detail

      • selectTracks

        void selectTracks(HlsMasterPlaylist playlist,
                  HlsTrackSelector.Output output)
           throws IOException
        Outputs a track selection for a given period.
        Parameters:
        playlist - The master playlist to process.
        output - The output to receive tracks.
        Throws:
        IOException - If an error occurs processing the period.
